title: The End of Religion: Encountering the Subversive Spirituality of Jesus
description: In The End of Religion, Bruxy Cavey shares that relationship has no room for religion. Believers and seekers alike will discover anew the wondrous promise found in our savior. And Christâ€™s eternal call to walk in love and freedom will resonate with readers of all ages and denominations.
author: Bruxy Cavey
